messages.title: Change Dartford's Future
messages.content: Dartford deserves a strong voice to stand up for its interests and stop it being used as a dumping ground for regional infrastructure. It deserves an MP who listens and acts to help residents achieve their goals.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Better Environment for Our Town
keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats will invest in better, cheaper public transport running on electricity or ultra-low emission fuels as well as smarter road systems that cut congestion and pollution; and will more than double the production of clean electricity to 60% by 2030.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Proper Funding for Our NHS and Social Care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will raise an extra 1p in the pound on Income Tax for the NHS and social care, prioritize mental health care and limit care fees for Dartford's 17,000 elderly. This will mean £18 million more for the Dartford and Gravesham NHS Trust, and £4.5 million for our mental health services.
We will support young people by investing an extra £7.2 Million in Dartford's schools and colleges.
We will boost the economy with a major program of capital investment, aimed at stimulating growth and taking the pressure off infrastructure hotspots like Dartford.
We support the development of sustainable communities and garden cities with room to grow, not town cramming in already build up areas.

issues.brexitEurope: And if you don’t know the final say, via a referendum, on any Brexit deal, and if you don't like how the deal shapes up, we should have the choice to remain in the EU.
issues.economy: We will boost the economy with a major program of capital investment, aimed at stimulating growth and taking the pressure off infrastructure hotspots like Dartford.
issues.education: We will support young people by investing an extra £7.2 Million in Dartford's schools and colleges.
issues.environment: The Liberal Democrats will invest in better, cheaper public transport running on electricity or ultra-low emission fuels.
issues.government: We would give 16 and 17-year-olds the right to vote in elections and referendums and will introduce proportional representation for Westminster and elections to ensure a fair representation of voters’ views.
issues.health: We will raise an extra 1p in the pound on Income Tax for the NHS and social care.
issues.lawCrime: We will increase support for our police, including an additional £6.7 million for Dartford's police service, and will take the profitable sale of cannabis out of the hands of criminal gangs and under government control.
issues.transport: The Liberal Democrats will invest in better, cheaper public transport running on electricity or ultra-low emission fuels.

community.content: We support the development of sustainable communities and garden cities with room to grow, not town cramming in already build up areas.

leaflet.personalStatement: If I am elected on June 8th, I will strive to give you that voice, that help and that choice. Your future, your choice. Now is not the time for business as usual!

examples: Here in Dartford, 6.7% of deaths are caused by air pollution
We will raise an extra 1p in the pound on Income Tax for the NHS and social care
An additional £6.7 million for Dartford's police service
£18 million more for the Dartford and Gravesham NHS Trust
£4.5 million for our mental health services
Dartford deserves a strong voice to stand up for its interests and stop it being used as a dumping ground for regional infrastructure.
We believe that everyone is entitled to the same opportunity to succeed in life.
We will invest in better, cheaper public transport.
£18 million more for the Dartford and Gravesham NHS Trust.
£4.5 million for our mental health services.
We will raise an extra 1p in the pound on Income Tax for the NHS and social care.
We support the development of sustainable communities and garden cities.
We would give 16 and 17-year-olds the right to vote in elections.
Conservative school cuts mean that children's chances are too often determined by their parents' background.
Only the Lib Dems will give the NHS the support it needs to avoid this disaster.
Theresa May has stopped listening and doesn't care.
